channel.title: Lau Siaw Young - Articles
channel.description:
The Deck is a repository of my thoughts, rants and musings.
I am The Deck.

item.title: Sublime 3 build system for Django
item.description: I’m a longtime user of Sublime Text. If you’ve never tried it I really advise you to give it a look, it’s really worth it. The beta version of Sublime 3 has been out for a few weeks now and I’m using it in parallel with the stable version 2 to test the new features. While those new features are interesting by themselves trying a new version is also the moment where I dig in the documentation to understand the features I have not used yet in the previous versions. And one of those features is the build systems.

item.title: Doctor Who killed my Adsense
item.description: A lot of you, dear readers, probably don’t know that one of my side projects is a little web site called pdfy.me

item.title: I want to believe
item.description: Just to reiterate on my yesterday’s post about the Apple TV : Ars Technica is running today an article titled “The rumor that won’t die: Apple’s perpetually pending video game console”. In this piece, the author try to dismiss the possibility of exactly what I was implying : that the silent refresh of the Apple TV may be the harbinger of third parties apps.

item.title: What does the new Apple TV SOC really mean ?
item.description: The news has come yesterday that a new Apple TV version is on its way. According to AnandTech, the updated device should sport a new SOC which would be a 32 nm version of the ipad 3 A5X.
